instruction: Summarize the following story in 2 sentences.
input: A small family-run grocery store in a rural town has been struggling to keep its doors open in the face of increasing competition from larger businesses. The store owners recently decided to launch an online store in order to broaden their reach.
output: The owners of a rural grocery store have been facing stiff competition from larger businesses, leading them to launch an online store as a way to expand their reach. They hope this will help keep their doors open and keep their business alive.
